title: [Self-Directed] Clinical Integrated Education Based on Virus Infection Diagnosis Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical and microbiology knowledge, with comprehension of basic clinical diagnostic procedures
context.additional_context: Enhancing integrated clinical skills through standardized patient (SP) simulations for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify patient medical history-taking and physical examination items for 8 viral infection cases with 90% accuracy
Learners can generate a list of the top 3 differential diagnoses for each case with 80% accuracy
Learners can establish appropriate testing plans (blood tests, imaging tests, etc.) for diagnosed cases with 75% accuracy
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
